description: We take a deep dive into the Champions of Russ detachment for the Space Wolves, talking about how it plays and why you'd take it over the Stormlance Task Force.
title: Detachment Focus: Champions of Russ (Updated November 13, 2024)

description: Trench Crusade, the new gothic fantasy Weird World War I-like from Mike Franchina (Blizzard, Fatshark, Grinding Gear Games) and Tuomas Pirinen (Mordheim), has taken the imagination of the online wargaming space by storm over the last couple weeks, recently passing over $3 million in pledges at its Kickstarter to help bring their vision to life. title: Goonhammer Video: Talking Trench Crusade with Mike Franchina and Tuomas Pirinen

description: A light backstabber, the Jenner runs a blend of lasers and missiles that really wants to open up some rear torsos. Take a look at the variants in this weeks Mech Overview.
title: Battletech Mech Overview: Jenner

description: Join me for my initial impressions after reading the Organized Play and Tournament Companion documents that GW put out on November 11!
title: Warhammer Underworlds: New Organized Play and Tournament Companion Documents

description: After many years, a Core set has returned to Magic. This Standard legal set is 50/50 new cards and reprints, and will remain legal through at least 2029 with annual reprints. A pared down selection of cards will be available in a Starter Collection and Beginner Box aimed at new players, with boosters for the […]
title: Magic: the Gathering Foundations Review, Part 2 of 3: White, Blue, and Black Cards

description: We take a deep dive into the Liberator Assault Group detachment for Blood Angels - what it is, how it works, and how to play it.
title: Detachment Focus: Liberator Assault Group (Updated November 13, 2024)

description: Welcome to Competitive Innovations, our weekly feature for a number of game lines across the tabletop wargame space. title: [40K] Competitive Innovations in 10th: Most Wanted pt.1

description: Azurite Sea, Lorcana’s sixth release, sets sail in late November and it’s looking like another fine set for the game as it continues to steam through its second year. Of course we are getting another 200+ cards to play with and some new goodies, but the big news is that Big Hero 6 and Chip […]
title: Mikey Mouse Club #41 – Under the Azurite Sea!

description: John from Can You Roll a Crit? is back covering the top 5 Kill Teams to beat elites! He goes over each faction in-depth, covering how they can beat the new Space Marine metalords in Kill Team! Have any questions or feedback? title: CYRAC: Top 5 Kill Teams to Beat Elites
